title: Create /config command handler plugin
acceptance_criteria: view: shows current settings (API key as 'âœ“ Set' or 'Not set', never masked value)
api-key: shows modal for entering API key, validates with OpenRouter API before saving
api-key-clear: removes stored API key with confirmation button
chat-model: autocomplete shows models from getOpenRouterModels(), saves selection
image-models: autocomplete shows image models, allows multi-select, saves array
reset: clears all user settings with confirmation button
webhook add: shows modal for name, URL, categories (comma-separated), isDefault
webhook list: shows all webhooks with embeds
webhook remove: autocomplete shows user's webhooks, deletes selected
webhook test: autocomplete shows user's webhooks, calls testWebhook()
